content: I have big problems uploading my examples to SIMPLIFIER. Many of my examples contains Bundles of more than one Resource and most of the time the platform just displays the waiting sign indefinitely, and no upload is done. The Bundle examples can unfortunately not be uploaded using Forge, that seems to upload more stable.
Hi @Thomas Tveit Rosenlund we are looking into the problem. Do you mind sending the files you tried to upload to marten@fire.ly ?
Hi Thomas, we did some experiments with uploading the files you sent. So far it worked for us. We found no issues. So we'll continue looking into it.

Thats weird @Martijn Harthoorn They still refuse to upload to my own test project. Could it be something with that specific SIMPLIFIER project? But probably not, as non of my projects works for uploading these bundles:
https://simplifier.net/ui/import/uploadfile?projectkey=Velferd-test-og-lek
Are you uploading a zip, or an individual (xml or json) file?
